document.full_text: the mets are weighing the talent and the experience that the 38-year-old isringhausen brings against the fear that keeping him on the 25-man roster could prove costly.
document.title: getting set to head north, mets wonder what isringhausen has left in the tank
lines_and_colors: the mets are weighing the talent and the experience that the 38-year-old isringhausen brings against the fear that keeping him on the 25-man roster could prove costly.
